metadata.Title: SoilTemperature
metadata.Extended description: The soil temperature model includes functionality for simulating the heat flux and temperatures over the soil profile, includes temperature on the soil surface. The processes are described below, most are based on Campbell, 1985. Soil profile represented by soil layers and temperature nodes; includes surface and phantom nodes below the profile. Many routines follow Campbell (1985) and a FORTRAN predecessor.
metadata.Short description: Simulates heat flux and temperatures over the soil profile (including surface) using Campbell (1985) algorithms.

process.name: doProcess
process.description: Perform actions for current day: compute net radiation, volumetric heat, thermal conductivity, iterate sub-daily to solve heat flow and update daily min/max/average soil temperatures.
process.firstLine: const int interactionsPerDay = 48;     // number of iterations in a day

inputs.name: weather_Tav
inputs.description: Weather Tav (long-term or daily baseline average temperature) used for initialization and baseline soil calculations

inputs.name: weather_MeanT
inputs.description: Daily mean air temperature (MeanT) used for initialization and some calculations

inputs.name: weather_MinT
inputs.description: Daily minimum air temperature (MinT)

inputs.name: weather_MaxT
inputs.description: Daily maximum air temperature (MaxT)

inputs.name: weather_Wind
inputs.description: Wind speed used in boundary layer conductance calculations

inputs.name: weather_Radn
inputs.description: Daily solar radiation (used for net radiation calculations)

inputs.name: weather_Amp
inputs.description: Annual temperature amplitude used in initial soil temperature seasonal cycle

inputs.name: weather_AirPressure
inputs.description: Air pressure used to compute air density (hPa)

inputs.name: weather_Latitude
inputs.description: Latitude of site used in solar geometry calculations (degrees)

inputs.name: clock_Today_DayOfYear
inputs.description: Day of year (clock.Today.DayOfYear) used in seasonal calculations

inputs.name: microClimate_CanopyHeight
inputs.description: Canopy height from MicroClimate (used to compute roughness and canopy effects) in mm

inputs.name: physical_Thickness
inputs.description: Soil layer thicknesses from Physical component (Thickness) - used to build internal thickness and node depths

inputs.name: physical_BD
inputs.description: Soil bulk density array from Physical (BD) used for thermal property calculations

inputs.name: physical_Rocks
inputs.description: Volumetric fraction of rocks per layer from Physical (percent)

inputs.name: physical_ParticleSizeSand
inputs.description: Sand fraction (%) per layer from Physical

inputs.name: physical_ParticleSizeSilt
inputs.description: Silt fraction (%) per layer from Physical

inputs.name: physical_ParticleSizeClay
inputs.description: Clay fraction (%) per layer from Physical

inputs.name: organic_Carbon
inputs.description: Soil organic carbon per layer from Organic (used to compute volumetric organic matter fraction)

inputs.name: waterBalance_SW
inputs.description: Soil water state array from WaterBalance (SW) used to compute node water fractions

inputs.name: waterBalance_Eo
inputs.description: Reference evaporation Eo used in diffuse penetration constant and net radiation computations

inputs.name: waterBalance_Eos
inputs.description: Soil/open-surface evaporation Eos used in diffuse penetration constant

inputs.name: waterBalance_Es
inputs.description: Actual soil evaporation (Es) used to compute latent heat flux

inputs.name: waterBalance_Salb
inputs.description: Soil albedo (Salb) used to compute reflected shortwave radiation

inputs.name: InitialValues
inputs.description: Public InitialValues property (initial temperatures per layer) - may be provided by user/input file

inputs.name: pInitialValues
inputs.description: Private initial values array used internally to initialize InitialValues

inputs.name: DepthToConstantTemperature
inputs.description: Depth down to constant temperature (DepthToConstantTemperature) used to size phantom nodes

inputs.name: instrumHeight
inputs.description: Instrument height override (instrumHeight) if set (m). Used to set instrumentHeight at init.

inputs.name: instrumentHeight
inputs.description: Instrument height (m) used in boundary layer conductance calculation (may be set from instrumHeight or adjusted by canopy height)

inputs.name: soilRoughnessHeight
inputs.description: Soil roughness height used in boundary layer calculations (initialized from bareSoilRoughness)

inputs.name: boundaryLayerConductanceSource
inputs.description: Source selection for boundary layer conductance ('calc' or 'constant')

inputs.name: netRadiationSource
inputs.description: Source selection for net radiation ('calc' or 'eos') used in surface boundary condition

inputs.name: nu
inputs.description: Forward/backward differencing coefficient (numerical weighting for time-centred scheme)

inputs.name: constantBoundaryLayerConductance
inputs.description: Constant boundary layer conductance (used if boundaryLayerConductanceSource == 'constant')

inputs.name: nodeDepth
inputs.description: Depths of nodes (m) internal array used for mapping layers to nodes and numerical solution

inputs.name: volSpecHeatSoil
inputs.description: Volumetric specific heat over the soil profile (J/K/m3) used in Thomas solver

inputs.name: thermalConductivity
inputs.description: Thermal conductivity over the soil profile (W.m/K) used in heat flow calculations

inputs.name: heatStorage
inputs.description: Heat storage at each node (J/K) used in numerical time integration

inputs.name: thermalConductance
inputs.description: Conductance of element between nodes (W/K) used in Thomas solver

inputs.name: soilTemp
inputs.description: Temperature of each soil node/layer (oC) current state

inputs.name: newTemperature
inputs.description: Temporary array for new temperatures at nodes (oC) used during iteration

inputs.name: soilWater
inputs.description: Volumetric water content per layer/node (internal, mapped from waterBalance.SW)

inputs.name: minSoilTemp
inputs.description: Minimum soil temperature tracked during the day (internal)

inputs.name: maxSoilTemp
inputs.description: Maximum soil temperature tracked during the day (internal)

inputs.name: aveSoilTemp
inputs.description: Average soil temperature accumulator over the day (internal)

inputs.name: thickness
inputs.description: Thickness of each soil element including phantom layers (mm) internal

inputs.name: bulkDensity
inputs.description: Bulk density array (g/cm3) internal (copied from physical.BD)

inputs.name: rocks
inputs.description: Rocks fraction array internal (copied from physical.Rocks)

inputs.name: carbon
inputs.description: Carbon array internal (copied from organic.Carbon)

inputs.name: sand
inputs.description: Sand fraction array internal (copied from physical.ParticleSizeSand)

inputs.name: silt
inputs.description: Silt fraction array internal (copied from physical.ParticleSizeSilt)

inputs.name: clay
inputs.description: Clay fraction array internal (copied from physical.ParticleSizeClay)

inputs.name: canopyHeight
inputs.description: Computed canopy height (m) used in boundary layer conductance calculations (derived from microClimate.CanopyHeight and soil roughness)

inputs.name: numLayers
inputs.description: Number of soil layers (computed from physical.Thickness) used to size arrays and outputs

inputs.name: numNodes
inputs.description: Number of nodes (numLayers + numPhantomNodes) used in numerical solution

inputs.name: timestep
inputs.description: Model internal time-step in seconds (timestep) used to convert energy/time units

inputs.name: netRadiation
inputs.description: Net radiation per internal time-step (MJ) set in process and used in boundary condition calculations

outputs.name: FinalSoilTemperature
outputs.description: Temperatures over the soil profile at end of a day, i.e. at midnight

outputs.name: FinalSoilSurfaceTemperature
outputs.description: Temperature of soil surface at end of a day (midnight)

outputs.name: Value
outputs.description: Mandatory ISoilTemperature interface property returning daily averaged temperatures (alias for AverageSoilTemperature)

outputs.name: AverageSoilTemperature
outputs.description: Temperatures over soil profile averaged over a day

outputs.name: AverageSoilSurfaceTemperature
outputs.description: Temperature of soil surface averaged over a day

outputs.name: MinimumSoilTemperature
outputs.description: Minimum temperatures over the soil profile within a day

outputs.name: MinimumSoilSurfaceTemperature
outputs.description: Minimum soil surface temperature within a day

outputs.name: MaximumSoilTemperature
outputs.description: Maximum temperatures over the soil profile within a day

outputs.name: MaximumSoilSurfaceTemperature
outputs.description: Maximum soil surface temperature within a day

outputs.name: BoundaryLayerConductance
outputs.description: Atmosphere boundary layer conductance averaged over a day

outputs.name: ThermalConductivity
outputs.description: Thermal conductivity over the soil profile

outputs.name: HeatCapacity
outputs.description: Volumetric heat capacity over the soil profile (J/K/m3)

outputs.name: HeatStore
outputs.description: Heat storage over the soil profile (J/K)

outputs.name: Thr_profile
outputs.description: Morning soil temperature profile (internal export, CHECK use)

functions.name: doNetRadiation
functions.description: Calculate initial variables for net radiation per time-step (populate solarRadn[], cloudFr and cva) and compute potential solar radiation distribution for the day.

functions.name: Zero
functions.description: Utility to zero the specified array.

functions.name: doVolumetricSpecificHeat
functions.description: Calculate the volumetric specific heat capacity (Cv, J/K/m3) at each soil node.

functions.name: doThermalConductivity
functions.description: Compute thermal conductivity for soil elements (layers) and map to nodes.

functions.name: interpolateTemperature
functions.description: Interpolate air temperature for a given time of day using daily min/max/mean and sinusoidal functions.

functions.name: interpolateNetRadiation
functions.description: Compute net radiation (shortwave + longwave) for a specific timestep (MJ) at the soil surface considering cover and cloud.

functions.name: getBoundaryLayerConductance
functions.description: Calculate atmospheric boundary layer conductance using wind, instrument height, canopy roughness and stability corrections.

functions.name: doThomas
functions.description: Numerical solution of the tridiagonal system (Thomas algorithm) to compute new temperatures at nodes for a time-step.

functions.name: doUpdate
functions.description: Update daily min, max and average soil temperatures and accumulate boundary layer conductance.
